title: Suicide Serial
description: People are dying left and right in the city of Winchester. When the body of Claire Miller, the ninth in a mysterious string of recent suicides is discovered, homicide detective Jake Harris and his partner Stacey King discover that the unusual suicides are actually the work of a new breed of serial killer. By preying on his targetâ€™s worst nightmares, he compels them to do exactly what he wants. However, the only thing this psychopath is after is to watch his victims kill themselves.(30,000+ words)
author: Matthew Boyd
